Configurable - Interface in imconfig
A convenient interface for objects that can apply a configuration to themselves.
Configuration - Interface in imconfig
The main interface used to get configuration values and create derived configurations.
ConfigurationException - Exception in imconfig
Multi-purpose runtime exception for any error occurred during the creation of a new configuration.
ConfigurationException(String) - Constructor for exception ConfigurationException
 
ConfigurationException(String, Throwable) - Constructor for exception ConfigurationException
 
ConfigurationException(Throwable) - Constructor for exception ConfigurationException
 
ConfigurationFactory - Interface in imconfig
A configuration factory is responsible of creating new instances of Configuration via multiple alternative sources such as URI, classpath resources, maps, and properties objects.
configure(Configuration) - Method in interface Configurable

configure(T, Configuration) - Method in interface Configurer
Apply the given configuration to the specified object
Configurer<T> - Interface in imconfig
A convenient interface for objects that can apply a configuration to another object.

I

imconfig - module imconfig
This module provides a simple interface in order to load and consume configurations, which are mainly a set of valued properties that can be parsed from a wide range of sources (such as JSON, YAML or .properties files, Map and Properties objects, or even plain pairs of values) to specific Java types.
imconfig - package imconfig
 
imconfig.types - package imconfig.types
 
inner(String) - Method in interface Configuration
Creates a new configuration resulting of filtering the properties starting with the given prefix, and the removing it
